ðŸ“– Summary: Browsernode is a TypeScript library that allows AI agents to control web browsers, enabling automation of online tasks. It is compatible with Browser-use APIs and offers examples for various use cases, including data extraction and document creation. The library supports both CommonJS and ESM module styles.
